messages.content: You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the build of the King in Yellow?
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How many magic points does the King in Yellow have?
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How many attacks does the King in Yellow have per round?
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the damage bonus for the King in Yellow's razor sharp tatters?
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the damage bonus for the King in Yellow's face tentacle?
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens to the target when they stare at the King in Yellow?
The target suffers paroxysms of fear, costing them 1D6 Sanity points per round.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How much magic points does the King in Yellow lose per round due to its gaze?
The King in Yellow loses 3 magic points per round.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the condition required to avoid the gaze of the King in Yellow for a round?
The target must make an Extreme POW roll.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the damage type when the King in Yellow attacks with its tattered robes?
The damage is by razor sharp tatters.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What are the two types of attacks the King in Yellow can use?
The King in Yellow can use attacks by razor sharp tatters or by face tentacle.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What are the effects of the Gaze of the Yellow King?
The Gaze of the Yellow King induces paroxysms of fear, costing the unfortunate target 1D6 Sanity points per round while the King in Yellow focuses upon them.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is required to avoid the Gaze of the Yellow King for a round?
The target must make an Extreme POW roll.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What are the effects of viewing the Yellow Sign?
Viewing the Yellow Sign causes 0/1D6 Sanity point loss.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What can be done to resist the Gaze of the Yellow King?
The Gaze Target must make an Extreme POW roll to resist.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the effect of the Yellow Sign on those who have seen it?
Those who have seen the Yellow Sign are considered blessed and chosen.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What effect does viewing the Yellow Sign have on Sanity points?
0/1D6 Sanity point loss.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens to the person affected by the Yellow Sign after losing Sanity points?
They suffer terrible nightmares concerning the King in Yellow, Carcosa, and Hastur, costing a further point of Sanity.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is required of the person who loses Sanity points after viewing the Yellow Sign?
They should make a Sanity roll (0/1) each night until either they succeed in the Sanity roll or madness overtakes them.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the effect of the person who fails the Sanity roll after viewing the Yellow Sign?
Madness overtakes them.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How does the person who has seen the Yellow Sign feel about Hastur's cults?
They are considered blessed and chosen.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens to a person who sees the Yellow Sign after losing Sanity points?
They suffer terrible nightmares concerning the King in Yellow, Carcosa, and Hastur, costing a further point of Sanity.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How much Sanity points does it cost to see the King in Yellow with the Pallid Mask upon its face?
0 Sanity points
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How many Sanity points does it cost to see the King in Yellow without the Pallid Mask?
1D3/1D10 Sanity points
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens to a person who fails to make a Sanity roll after losing Sanity points?
Madness overtakes them.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Who is the Lord of the Great Abyss?
Primal Nodens
